name: CHESS EX!
description:
Chess EX takes the game of chess and puts a unique and slightly more complicated twist on it

Each player has a unique faction and all new pieces to fight with!

All faction's King pieces have a new ability. After X amount of turns, they deploy new units to back you up. Use this at strategic times to outplay even the tightest of situations!

Fight with the Holy AeroKnights, similar to the chess you know and love but you have an acolyte that can protect units from being taken! 

Fight with the Void Maidens, the corruption spreading throughout the lands with too many units to handle.

Fight with the Shatter Stalkers, the scattered bounty hunters hiding a secret plan that will be revealed with time, and will change the course of history.

More factions to come!
